mapper.select: select manage from manage where manage_no = #{manageNo}
mapper.update:
update employee set employee_no = #{employeeNo}, employee_id = #{employeeId}, employee_pw = #{employeePw}, employee_name = #{employeeName}, employee_phone = #{employeePhone}, employee_addr = #{employeeAddr}, employee_team = #{employeeTeam}, employee_admin = #{employeeAdmin}, employee_email = #{employeeEmail}, manage_no = #{manageNo}
where employee_no = #{employeeNo}
